website_summaries.verdict: Strappy supportive shoe that stays secure on the foot.
pros: Next best thing to being barefoot, say users
This sandal gets top marks for its circulation system on the outsole, which keeps feet cool
cons: Stitching on the inside was irritating

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a very comfortable sandal for doing Disney for 10 days when our daughter comes down this summer. Tried them out at Bush Gardens. They are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. I do wish the stitching around the perimeter wasn't there, but even with that they are still more comfortable than other Clark's sandals I have. Would like to get them in another color, but they want $30.00 more for the white and not eligible for Prime free 2 day shipping. I am going to wait and hope they come down in price or are offered by another seller. Different colors from different sellers can vary quite a bit in price. Still very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Jblipe

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes product
customer_reviews.text: Clarks shoes is awesome, great, comfortable, I bought these sandals in black before a recent trip to France and wore it constantly. Its very nice looking to wear with summer clothes/styles and incredibly comfortable. The strap allows for size adjustment which helps if your feet swell, and they are lightweight and a bit squishable, which makes them easy to pack. The best thing however is the thick sole. In France I found myself walking endlessly on pebbled pavements, cobbled streets, and walkways of sand. HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT!
customer_reviews.author: Ng

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhh comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the most comfortable sandal I've ever owned... feels like you're barefoot, but with support and a cushion-y heel. The only thing I don't like is the raised stitching that runs the perimeter of the foot pad about a half inch from the edge of the shoe. I wish the surface under my foot was totally smooth. Also I've gotten mine wet a few times and the edges of the velcro tabs are curling up a bit. But I'm still rating 5 stars because of comfort and support!
customer_reviews.author: L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sandal
customer_reviews.text: I wore these, almost straight out of the box, all over Italy on a 10 day trip. They were so comfortable and light weight--no stress to walk for miles over uneven ground. I'm about to purchase my third pair. I have both the titanium and blue nubuck; they both go with everything. They do stretch out a bit, but that made them even more comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Dom

customer_reviews.title: comfy and great color
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Clark sandals I have purchased. I am going in for total knee replacement this fall so walking this summer is a chore. These sandals are extremely comfortable and I find I can walk for much longer periods than most of the other sandals I have. The adjustable straps come in handy in the heat when my feet swell. They are a great color and not so clunky like other sandals in this style.
customer_reviews.author: good sole

customer_reviews.title: Runs WIDE and slightly short
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, EXCEPT beware that they run wide. I can't get the left lowest strap tight enough, and my foot is just slightly narrow. All the straps would be better if shortened, as they hang so far off the side when tightened all the way. Too bad they don't come in Narrow. I can't imagine anyone's foot being wide enough for the Wide. I considered going down a 1/2 size but they are barely long enough as it is. Verdict: I'll have the strap shortened because the exceptional comfort makes them worth it.
customer_reviews.author: shoelover

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Thiis my third pair of Clark's Unstructured sandals. The only complaint I have a out them is the stitching on the insole that can sometimes rub the heel area. Otherwise, these are great sandals...very comfortable, even walking for long periods of time. The fit is true to size, and the Velcro straps allow adjustments, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Barefootmom

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE THE ONES!!!  BUY THEM QUICK!
customer_reviews.text: After buying and returning 10 pair of expensive size 11W 'comfort' sandals of different brands from different online stores, these are the ones I put on and walked all day in! They have just enough arch support, are stylish, stable, light weight and all around adjustable with velcro closures. Three things would make these shoes perfect: 1. sueded soles 2. lower price 3. broader availability of colors in 11W, especially in the dressier black snake version without the weird white stitching I came back to order more and was disappointed again, in the limited selection of available colors.
customer_reviews.author: CV

customer_reviews.title: Very lighweith and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very good for a regular foot. Just if you have problem with the arch maybe it will be an issue for long term use. The are very well designed, so light that you forget you wearing shoes, very convenience and durable. The straps are a big plus
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clarks Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Bought these sandals for my wife trough Amazon as she has a larger foot and finds it difficult to buy in shops,as larger sizes seem to sellout fast.She has been happy with her purchase and would recommend these sandals to others.They arrived at our Australian address promptly and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Ernst Forster

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & Style!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with these sandals! They are extremely comfortable and soft, plus they look very stylish too! I have a difficult time with my feet to start with, so finding shoes that are comfortable with good cushion and support can be a challenge. I've worn these sandals enough times now to say that they are very good and I haven't had sore feet after wearing them. I highly recommend the un.ports, and I'm even considering getting a second pair of a different color! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Clarks Womens UN.PORT Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Clarks shoes never disappoint me with the fit and comfort. Even though they were sold as "used,' the sandals were like new. What an excellent buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: phylleem

customer_reviews.title: clarks unstructured womens un.port sandal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sandals at Amazon on sale. Terrific price! I really like them; they are light weight and comfortable with lots of support. I especially like the velcro straps. Since I have one foot wider than the other, I can adjust the straps for a snug fit. I purchased the khaki color which looks dressy and goes with my capris and pants. Clarks are always good quality shoes.I would purchase another pair from Amazon, especially at the sale price!
customer_reviews.author: Loves Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable sandal. They are worth the price. I love the neutral titanium color.
customer_reviews.author: Albireo

customer_reviews.title: Comfort plus!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. Totally adjustable to your foot and comfort plus. I would recommend to anyone looking for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: BLong

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal
customer_reviews.text: I had this sandal for a few seasons. It's comfortable, great for walking. Received good compliments. Price was a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: great shoe, very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have been enjoying wearing this shoe...it feels great whenever hiking/walking....feels very light on my foot....i also bought a pair for my mom.... She wore this sandal year around in texas and she said that's the single most comfortable shoe and she really enjoys it! Thanks Clarks!
customer_reviews.author: Stoneforest08

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: this is a great shoe. True to size and fells good on your feet I have 3 pair in white brown and black colors
customer_reviews.author: suzyQ

customer_reviews.title: Walking on air
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect in every way; fit, color, comfort. I love the adjustable straps. These are very comfortable for wearing all day.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe, the finish was not what I expected, did not know it was a shiny leather but love the shoe anyways/
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFORTABLE!
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfy shoes I have found anywhere, and they are pretty cute, too. I like the number of colors available, too. All shoes should be this versatile and did I say...comfortable?
customer_reviews.author: JTXan

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are most comfortable. I have problem feet with bunions and hammer toes. These sandals adjust well to deal with this problem. I wore them to New York City for a day and they were still comfortable at the end of the day. I bought the white metallic, and I hope to buy the apricot in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Es77

customer_reviews.title: Nice style but too narrow for me
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the style and quality of these sandals but they were too narrow foy me. They were sent back for a refund....still looking for the perfect comfort sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: sandals
customer_reviews.text: They were nice sandals but I have a narrow foot and they didn't work at all. I hated to send them back but I couldn't wear them either so had no choice.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Winner Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, durable, and sooooooo comfortable. Great fit. I had purchased a pair in silver two years ago. I could not get them locally because they were out of stock. I wanted them in white and was able to get them through Amazon. Delivery was prompt. Price was reasonable. Best of all, these are good sandals with the advantage of total comfort in wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn V. Billings

customer_reviews.title: Best sandal ever.
customer_reviews.text: This sandal looks good, wears good, feels good. You can adjust it to fit. Love it! I love walking in them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shears

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best sandals ever, I wish I could find another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Jozefowicz

customer_reviews.title: travel shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a tour to Italy. The stitching on the insert was a little uncomfortable and it was curved up. I put my orthodics in there for all the walking, so I didn't feel all the stitching anyway. They did work out well for the trip and I was able to wear them with shorts, skirts and slacks.
customer_reviews.author: suzyq

customer_reviews.title: Clarks Unstructured Women's Un.Port Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sandal early in the summer and have worn it more than any of my other sandals. It is super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Trapp

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly Sandals
customer_reviews.text: If I were a poet, I'd write an ode to these sandals. They are so comfortable, so perfect, that whenever I wear them, I feel as though I'm walking on puffy clouds. When you find a shoe that allows you to forget that you even have feet, it's like a miracle. No awareness of something digging in, or your heels starting to hurt, or the balls of your feet starting burn. This can wreck your day. I have actually started wearing these for working out on the treadmill because they blow away the most expensive pair of runners. My high-priced Asics aren't half as comfortable as these sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Smart

customer_reviews.title: Totally adjustable, comfortable, attractive sandal!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals! I bought them based on their positive reviews and the only other thing I would add is that their three straps are very adjustable so that you can really have a perfect fit. I have narrow feet and have trouble finding sandals that are narrow enough to fit. The back strap is also wider and more padded at the back of the heel. These are also very attractive.....feel like comfortable walking sandals but look a little fancier.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: The Best Fitting Sandal Ever
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this sandal saying it was the best feeling sandal she ever had. I couldn't agree more! It is so light-weight it feels like you are not wearing shoes at all. It is so comfortable; I've already sent for a bronze pair to match my black pair. Now if they only came in navy blue.....You can't go wrong with this sandal -- I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Zigler

product_meta.title: Clarks Women's UN.Port
product_meta.description:
From its humble beginnings in 1825 in the tiny English village of Street, Somerset, to a global company that manufactures and markets close to 35 million pairs of shoes a year, Clarks' commitment to comfort, quality, authenticity, and individual style has remained unchanged throughout the centuries.

This easy-going sandal from Clarks is the perfect choice for any warm-weather, casual outing. The Un.Port features triple hook-and-loop straps that adjust to the perfect fit, and the shoe is part of the Unstructured collection, which features a unique ventilation system on the outsole allowing fresh air to move in, and keeps the foot cool and comfortable, all day long.

From its humble beginnings in 1825 in the tiny English village of Street, Somerset, to a global company that manufactures and markets close to 35 million pairs of shoes a year, Clarks' commitment to comfort, quality, authenticity, and individual style has remained unchanged throughout the centuries.

See more
feature_bullets: Soft lambskin linings with minimal stitching helps prevent abrasion.
Unique Air Circulation System features intake vents to allow cool, fresh air to enter and moist air to escape.
Contoured leather footbed reduces foot friction and extra cushioning at heel provides added support.
Injected EVA sole with Ultra Flex Grooves to help ease the walking motion.
Strike pads absorb shock and add traction without weight.
